biotools.summary: OLIDA is a curated database of oligogenic diseases and the variants in genes that have been published as causing these diseases. The combinations of variants that are contained in this database have been identified by researchers as being the cause of certain genetic diseases.

bioschemas.name: OLIDA: OLIgogenic diseases DAtabase
bioschemas.summary: OLIDA is a curated database of oligogenic diseases and the variants in genes that have been published as causing these diseases. The combinations of variants that are contained in this database have been identified by researchers as being the cause of certain genetic diseases.
